scripts.test-ui: npx nyc playwright test && npx nyc report --reporter=html --reporter=json --report-dir ./coverage-ui && rm -r ./.nyc_output
scripts.coverage-merge: mkdir -p coverage-total && cp ./coverage-ui/coverage-final.json ./coverage-total/ui.json && cp ./coverage-unit/coverage-final.json ./coverage-total/unit.json && npx nyc merge ./coverage-total/ ./coverage-total/coverage-final.json
scripts.coverage-merge-report: mkdir .nyc_output && cp ./coverage-total/coverage-final.json .nyc_output/out.json && nyc report --reporter=text --reporter=html --report-dir=./coverage-total/ && nyc report --reporter=text > ./coverage-total/text-report.txt && rm -r ./.nyc_output
scripts.coverage: npm run test-ui && npm run test-unit && npm run coverage-merge && npm run coverage-merge-report
scripts.clean: rm -r dist coverage-ui coverage-unit coverage-total .nyc_output playwright-report test-results
